REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0531 reute r f BC-GENERAL-VIDEOTEX-ADDS 03-05 0049

TEXT.TITLE: GENERAL VIDEOTEX ADDS INVESTMENT <IVES> SERVICE
TEXT.BODY: <General Videotex Corp> said it added Investment Technologies Co's VESTOR on-line stock market analysis database to its DELPHI network service. It said the VESTOR service will be available on Delphi within 30 days. Reuter
